title: Wounded Souls: book 3 in the Scarred trilogy
description: Life’s never going to be the same again. My life’s been nothing but a struggle. The last three years, however, have been better. I’m in a committed relationship. I’ve got several good friends. I’ve got my family—such as it is. Everything’s good, but it’s all shattered web my stepfather’s released from prison.  I know him better than anyone. I know he’s vindictive. I know he hates me for putting him in prison for years. And I know someone’s following me, always out of sight.  Everyone says I’m paranoid, and maybe I am, but what if I’m not?  This novel was first released in 2016. The 2019 edition includes better formatting and new scenes, bringing the complete novel to 67,000 words. The book contains flashbacks to abuse, depictions of self-harm and suicide attempts.
author: T.T.  Kove
